descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Verdana][color=#00ffff][size=6]Julitta[/size][/color]
[color=#a2c4c9](Joy Of Life; Love's Child)

[/color][/font]~Now Part of [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/78307/?]The Femme Fatale Follower Pack[/url]~


[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/j7yffxamf/20160814184638_1.jpg[/img]

[font=Verdana]Name:  Julitta
Race:  Imperial
Voice:  Female Young Eager
Marriageable:  Yes
Weight:  100
Body:  Basic UNP, CBBE & SevenBase
Skin:  Fair Skin
Weapon:  Hunting Grounds Weapon Set

Armor:  Hunting Grounds Armor Set
No Armor Version Under Optional Downloads

Class:  Combat Assassin
Combat Style:  Boss One-Handed
Location:  Windpeak Inn (Dawnstar)

Levels With Player. Imperial Traits.

Bonuses to Light Armor, Sneak, One-Hand

Tested with AFT & EFF[/font]

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/xsfiar5l3/20160814105419_1.jpg[/img]

[youtube]i3wK5ndSK-k[/youtube]

[font=Verdana][color=#00ffff][size=4]REQUIREMENTS:[/size][/color]

TBBP/BBP Compatible Skeleton such as XPMSE (Armor Requirement)

No Known Requirements For No Armor Version

[color=#00ffff][size=4]RECOMMENDED:[/size][/color]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68000/?]XPMSE[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53996/?]HDT Physics[/url]

[color=#00ffff][size=4]INSTALLATION:[/size][/color]

Manual or your favorite mod manager.

[color=#00ffff][size=4]UNINSTALL:[/size][/color]

Manual removal of all Julitta files or your favorite mod manger.

[color=#00ffff][size=4]KNOWN ISSUES:
[/size][/color]
None at this time.
